document.full_text: larry kramer, the playwright now making his broadway debut with 'the normal heart,' is handing out letters outside performances of his play reminding theatergoers that h.i.v. and aids are still a real problem.
document.title: larry kramer hand delivers a message
lines_and_colors: larry kramer, the playwright now making his broadway debut with 'the normal heart,' is handing out letters outside performances of his play reminding theatergoers that h.i.v. and aids are still a real problem.
